description: TIME CEO Jessica Sibley sent the following note to staff on Thursday: Team,  Together we are making incredible progress on the plan we have in place to build a sustainable future for TIME. To build on the strong momentum I shared yesterday and continue to grow and diversify our revenue, I am announcing the following…
title: TIME Names Revenue Leaders to Accelerate Global Partnerships

description: The “Best Companies and Colleges for Future Leaders” project aims to identify organizations in the U.S. that excel in nurturing highly influential leaders. This project explores questions like: “Where are top U.S. leaders typically educated?” and “Which companies often act as key stepping-stones and development platforms for U.S. leaders advancing to high-ranking positions?” These rankings…
title: How TIME and Statista Determined the Best Companies and Colleges for Future Leaders for 2025

description: The only president before Trump to win, lose, and win again ended up decimating his own party during his second term.

description: Methodology: How TIME and Statista Determined the World’s Best Brands of 2024 In 2024, TIME and Statista launched the inaugural list of the World’s Best Brands, based on consumer surveys conducted in countries around the world, beginning with the U.S., India, and Brazil. description: Methodology: How TIME and Statista Determined the World’s Best Brands of 2024 Brands are mysterious things. Created by companies looking to promote specific products or services, they’re ultimately defined—for better or worse—by consumer perceptions. They also play starring roles in our preferences and spending behavior as companies respond to, and shape, market trends.  Consider Bath…
title: World’s Best Brands – United States

description: Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo emphasized the importance of integrating security with innovation when it comes to something as rapidly advancing and as powerful as artificial intelligence.
